channel.title: 游戏 on 好久不见
channel.description: Recent content in 游戏 on 好久不见

item.title: CSGO.技巧.跳跃
item.description: 连跳 W Space+ A+ 鼠标左摆 落地时+ Space+ D 跳箱子 正对箱子，Ctrl+ Space Ctrl+ W 跳远 W Space A+ 鼠标左摆 D+ 鼠标右摆 参考 CSGO跳跃技巧及操作方法心得详解

item.title: CSGO.脚本
item.description: 设置项 CSGO详细参数.md 脚本 示例 单人模式 single.cfg sv_cheats 1 bot_kick sv_infinite_ammo 1 noclip bind "H" "noclip" mp_startmoney "16000" sv_grenade_trajectory "1" sv_grenade_trajectory_time "20" sv_grenade_trajectory_dash "0" sv_grenade_trajectory_thickness "1" sv_grenade_trajectory_time_spectator "1" sv_showimpacts 1 sv_showimpacts_time 25 mp_roundtime 99 mp_timelimit "999" mp_freezetime "0" mp_buy_anywhere "1" mp_buytime 9999 bind "k" "bot_add_ct" bind "l" "bot_add_t" bot_zombie "0" 备注 目前
